name: Octopus
description:
The world needs a shepherd to guide it through the ages, but you’re the only we found to do it.

Instructions:

  • Move the cards at the bottom to the different world zones on the top of the screen.
  • Each time you play a card, time passes
  • The game ends if you lose all zones or if you win. It’s not very clear if you lose or not, so if the game openly makes fun of you, you’ve lost :)

Team:

  • Hernan Marandino - Music and sound
  • Ulises Martinez - Programming
  • Gabriel Álvarez - Art
  • Edu Gargollo - Design

Made for Ludum Dare 38
